auth.description: The creator has enabled verification, please fill in the sharing code below
auth.title: Need to share code

form.description_placeholder: Describe the music you want to generate

udio_advanced.clarity_tooltip:
Controls the priority the model places on clarity and instrument separation when generating audio. 
Higher values ​​may produce clearer audio, but the sound may be less natural.
udio_advanced.lyrics_strength_tooltip:
Control how much lyrics influence generated content. 
Lower values ​​may produce a more natural sound, but may ignore some lyrical content.
udio_advanced.negative_prompt_placeholder: Enter keywords such as styles and concepts that you do not want to get...
udio_advanced.negative_prompt_tooltip: Use this feature to help models reduce the influence of specific genres, styles, or concepts on your creations
udio_advanced.prompt_strength_tooltip:
Used to control the influence of prompt words on generated content. 
Higher values ​​improve compliance with cue words but may result in less natural sounds being generated.
udio_advanced.quality_tooltip: You can choose to sacrifice the generation speed to obtain higher quality content, or choose to speed up the generation speed at the expense of content quality (the further to the right, the higher the generation quality and the slower the generation speed, and vice versa)
udio_advanced.title: Advanced parameter settings

errors.polling_failed: Music generation failed, please try again
errors.submit_failed: Submission failed, please try again later
errors.suno_submit_failed: Suno music submission failed, please try again later
errors.udio_submit_failed: Udio music submission failed, please try again later

form.lyrics_placeholder: Enter your lyrics, or a description of the song you wish to generate, then click AI Generate Lyrics

success.styles_generated_1: Audio track 1 style description generated successfully
success.styles_generated_2: Audio track 2 style description generated successfully
